title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
OB: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, the column icons do not appear.
EB: Expected Result: When expanding the Data Source in the Available Items sector by clicking the related icon, both table icons and column icons should appear. Actual Result: Only table icons appear, column icons are missing.
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a derby database using the following details: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui User Name: root Password: root 4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query. 6. [Missing information: please provide details on what should be done in step 6 to reproduce the issue].
